basics.name: Mohammad Hamarsheh
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a specialized frontend engineer with extensive experience developing design systems & websites that range from landing pages to fully functional web apps. I always enjoy transforming abstract ideas into programs that serve me and those around me. I aim at delivering performant, responsive and scalable products

work.summary: Working on a design system that is used internally by different teams at Riskified

Nokia Mediation is working on "Data Refinery for Charging Gateway". Data Refinery comes with multiple products that are customized to extract the information from different raw data sources by various transformations, aggregations, filtering, etc. It combines the resulting data flow to allow further enrichment of the data.
In this position, I worked with a different set of technologies where Python, Java, Redis DB, and Robot testing framework were used to do a various range of tasks that included:
highlights: Developing data transformation layers (streams)
Database management using Redis
Building and deploying streams based on customer requirements
Handling Jenkins pipelines for CI/CD
Writing integration tests for different products using the Nokia Robot framework
Maintaining multiple internal tools used by different Nokia mediation teams
Editing open-source projects and extending their functionalities to meet our project needs
Integrating different Nokia mediation repositories and provide continuous maintenance for them
Guiding documentation specialists through implemented features and provide them with all necessary inputs

work.summary: Effectively participate on projects outsourced to Exalt by international companies including Nokia and Riskified
Participate in an extensive training on modern technologies in backend, databases and frontend
highlights: Familiarized with Spring basics including dependency injection (DI) and inversion of control (IoC)
Learnt Spring Boot basics and got comfortable with its auto configuration and its different main projects
Grasped Restful APIs architecture pattern and its best practices
Implementation and design of different Rest APIs with Spring Boot Web
Handling SQL Databases with Spring Boot Data JPA
Centralizing Rest APIs error handling through Spring's advice controllers
Spring Boot security authentication and authorization implementation with json web token (JWT)
Rest API endpoints documentation with Swagger
Familiarized with single page applications concepts and paradigms
Learnt ReactJs basics including components, state and props
Familiarized with React class based components with their lifecycle
Familiarized with React functional components with hooks and custom hooks
Familiarized with React context api, routing and rest API consumption
Turning website land pages mockups in to a functional working websites
